title: Evangeline
description: Angeline Gottschalk, bullied in school and abused on the farm, is hiding a dark and terrifying secret-- one buried so deep that not even she knows the truth. That secret is Evangeline, the homicidal twin "sister" who narrates this extraordinary memoir of a teenaged serial killer out for revenge and living her dream in the American Heartland. Evangeline contains graphic language, sexual situations and violence.
author: E.A. Gottschalk
